attributes.action: Scrap the proposed plans for compulsary education up to 18 years of age for children strudying in the U.K
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many children do not enter the world with the skills they need to survive in the world of work. However this problem will not be solved by draconian laws. We must tackle the root cause of the problem- parenting and childcare. As well as encouraging children to continue in education, rather than forcing them. Draconian proposals such as these will only exacerbate this country's skills deficit
